wiki.content: Linkin Park's new single "New Divide," from the motion picture Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen. Co-frontman Mike Shinoda told Billboard that as a group of confirmed fans of the toy and cartoon franchise, Linkin Park "created a song that we felt fit the spirit of the movie and the characters and also obviously stayed true to the spirit of the band." (Source New Divide Songfacts). User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Linkin Park's new single "New Divide," from the motion picture Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen. Co-frontman Mike Shinoda told Billboard that as a group of confirmed fans of the toy and cartoon franchise, Linkin Park "created a song that we felt fit the spirit of the movie and the characters and also obviously stayed true to the spirit of the band." (Source New Divide Songfacts).

track.name: New Divide
comments:
New Divide é muito épica, mas...
A THOUSAND SUNS >>>>>>>>> New Divide
The phenomenonal song from linkin park. . I just love them.
effects used in music video are pure shit. but the song is great.
New Divide >>>> "A Thousand Suns" and "Living Things". [15] And the reason for this: New Divide in my opinion is the best of all LP songs!

New Divide >>>> "A Thousand Suns"
and "Living Things". [14]
The only Linkin Park song I like.
Easily one of my favorite songs from LP, if not THE favorite song.
Most of the actual songs on A Thousand Suns are by far better than New Divide. Sorry.
